import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Row, Col, Badge, Table } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useReactToPrint } from 'react-to-print'; import { useRef } from "react"; const ViewExpense = (props) => { const data = props.data; const sentenceCase = (text) => { if (text.length === 0) return text; const firstLetter = text[0].toString().toUpperCase(); const rest = text.substring(1).toLowerCase(); const ans = firstLetter + rest; return ans; }; console.log("daTA ->"); console.log(data); const componentRef = useRef(); const handlePrint = useReactToPrint({ content: () => componentRef.current, }); return (
{" "} {/* fullscreen = {true} */} Expense Entry

Employee Name

{" "} Entry Date

Total Reimbursement

Status

{data.employee.firstName + " " + data.employee.lastName}
{data.date}
{data.currency + " " + Number(Number(data.amount) + Number(data.tax).toFixed(2))}
{sentenceCase(data.status)}

Date
Project Name
Expense Name
Description
Payment Method
Tax Zone
Amount
Tax
Net Amount
Approver
Billable
{data.date}
{data.project.projectName}
{data.name}
{data.description}
{sentenceCase(data.paymentMethod)}
{data.taxZone}
{Number(data.amount).toFixed(2)}
{Number(data.tax).toFixed(2)}
{data.currency + " " + Number(Number(data.amount) + Number(data.tax).toFixed(2))}
{data.project.projectManager.firstName + " " + data.project.projectManager.lastName}
{data.billable ? "Yes" : "No"}
{sentenceCase(data.status)}
); }; export default ViewExpense;
